synonyms.synonym: DNA repair protein complementing XP-D cells
TFIIH basal transcription factor complex 80 kDa subunit

protein.specific_function: ATP-dependent 5'-3' DNA helicase, component of the core-TFIIH basal transcription factor. Involved in nucleotide excision repair (NER) of DNA by opening DNA around the damage, and in RNA transcription by RNA polymerase II by anchoring the CDK-activating kinase (CAK) complex, composed of CDK7, cyclin H and MAT1, to the core-TFIIH complex. Involved in the regulation of vitamin-D receptor activity. As part of the mitotic spindle-associated MMXD complex it plays a role in chromosome segregation. Might have a role in aging process and could play a causative role in the generation of skin cancers.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
positive regulation of transcription from RNA polymerase II promoter
termination of RNA polymerase I transcription
transcription elongation from RNA polymerase I promoter
transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter
transcription initiation from RNA polymerase I promoter
transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter
